full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
**Snow Removal Services for Transport Canada**

## Reference and Solicitation Numbers
* Reference Number: cb-9247-81399601
* Solicitation Number: T8080-220687
* Amendment Number: 4

## Key Dates
* Publication Date: 2023-09-19
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-06T14:00:00 (expired)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-04-30

## Tender Description
Transport Canada invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for snow removal services at a building located at 700 Leigh-Capreol, Dorval, Quebec. The scope of work includes the provision of labor, equipment, tooling, abrasive products, ice melters, and materials, as well as the supervision required for clearing, snow removal, and spreading of ice melters or abrasives.

## Specifications
The building to be serviced comprises two parking lots, sidewalks, and stairs. The successful proponent will be required to clear snow and ice from these areas, as well as provide the necessary materials and equipment to ensure the work is performed safely and efficiently.

## Contract Information
* Contracting Entity: Transport Canada
* Contact Person: Diane Jazzar
* Contact Email: diane.jazzar@tc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (613) 866-4767
* Contact Address: 330 Sparks St. Tower C, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0N5

## Tender Documents
The tender notice, request for proposal (RFP), and notices to proponents (NPP) can be found on the Canada Buys website:

* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/9247/t8080-220687---npp-final-(en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9247/t8080-220687---npp-final-%28en.pdf)
* French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/9247/t8080-220687---complete-rfp-%28fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9247/t8080-220687---complete-rfp-%28fr
